metadata.description: Enhanced Executive Metrics Dashboard - Complete upgrade with new analytics tracking

enhancements_completed.summary: Enhanced your existing Executive Metrics dashboard with new event tracking, added 5 new executive insights, and created 4 additional specialized dashboards

updated_insights.insight_name: User Conversion Journey: Visitor to Lead
changes: Updated to use new event: New_Visitor (instead of $pageview)
Updated to use new event: New_Partial_Ranking (first question answered)
Updated to use new event: New_Full_Ranking_Submittal (all questions complete)
Added breakdown by $initial_utm_source for traffic source comparison
Enhanced step labels with emojis for better visualization
updated_insights.why_better: Now tracks complete journey with proper unique user events instead of pageviews. Shows where users are dropping off with accurate conversion rates.

changes: Added New_Visitor tracking (unique users instead of pageviews)
Added Tool_Try_Free_Click tracking (HIGH INTENT monetization metric)
Changed to weekly interval for better trend visibility
All metrics now use consistent unique user tracking
metrics_tracked: âš¡ Active Users - First meaningful action taken
âœ… Rankings Complete - Finished all guided ranking questions
ðŸ“§ Reports Sent - Primary conversion (leads generated)
ðŸš€ Try Free Clicks - High-intent tool trial clicks (monetization)
updated_insights.why_better: Now includes tool monetization metric (Try Free clicks) alongside conversion funnel. Shows complete picture of user engagement AND revenue potential.

new_insights_added.description: Executive KPI showing % of visitors who become leads
new_insights_added.why_important: Single most important metric for executive visibility. Shows if the tool is effectively converting traffic to leads.
new_insights_added.action_if_low: Focus on funnel optimization, especially drop-off points between steps

new_insights_added.description: % of visitors who take first meaningful action
new_insights_added.why_important: Shows if landing page/first impression is compelling. High engagement = quality tool experience.
new_insights_added.action_if_low: Improve landing page, add better CTA, simplify first steps

new_insights_added.insight_name: ðŸš€ Top 5 Tools - High Intent Actions
new_insights_added.description: Tools with most Try Free clicks (monetization indicator)
new_insights_added.why_important: Shows which tools users are most interested in trying. Direct indicator of vendor partnership opportunities and revenue potential.
action_items: Prioritize vendor partnerships with top-clicking tools
Use for negotiating commission rates (show traffic value)
Identify tools to feature more prominently
Focus content marketing on popular tools

new_insights_added.why_important: Shows which marketing channels bring the best quality leads. Essential for marketing budget allocation.
action_items: Investigate why certain sources convert better
A/B test messaging on underperforming channels

new_insights_added.description: % of users who complete all questions after starting
new_insights_added.why_important: Quality indicator - if users abandon questions, they might be too long/boring or not valuable enough.

existing_insights_kept.note: Shows daily traffic trends. Complements New_Visitor tracking.

existing_insights_kept.insight_name: Daily Active Users by Activity Type
existing_insights_kept.note: Shows which actions users take. Breakdown by action type reveals feature usage patterns.
Daily conversion trend. Essential for monitoring lead generation.
Pie chart showing activity distribution. Helps understand user engagement patterns.

Track tool engagement and monetization opportunities

dashboards.use_for: Vendor partnership decisions, commission negotiations, feature prioritization

dashboards.purpose: Optimize marketing spend based on channel performance
dashboards.use_for: Marketing budget allocation, channel optimization, campaign ROI

dashboards.purpose: Understand how users interact with the tool
Live monitoring during launches and campaigns
dashboards.use_for: Launch monitoring, campaign performance, real-time alerting

before_vs_after.after: âœ… Uses New_Visitor event (unique users only)
before_vs_after.impact: Accurate unique visitor counts, no inflation from refreshes

before_vs_after.after: âœ… Complete 5-step funnel showing all drop-off points
before_vs_after.impact: Can identify exactly where users abandon the flow

before_vs_after.after: âœ… Try Free clicks tracked in weekly growth + dedicated dashboard

before_vs_after.before: No attribution visibility on main dashboard
before_vs_after.after: âœ… Traffic Source Performance table added
âœ… Engagement Rate + Guided Ranking Completion added
before_vs_after.impact: Early indicators of user experience quality

before_vs_after.after: âœ… 5 metrics including Try Free clicks (monetization)
before_vs_after.impact: Complete picture of business health in one chart

for_leadership_meetings.what_to_say: X% of visitors become leads. Target is 10%+. This is our primary KPI.
for_leadership_meetings.action: Show trend over time, compare to industry benchmarks

for_leadership_meetings.what_to_say: X% of visitors actively engage with the tool. Target is 70%+. Shows landing page effectiveness.
for_leadership_meetings.action: If low, prioritize landing page optimization

for_leadership_meetings.what_to_say: X users clicked Try Free on tool trials this week. Direct monetization indicator.
for_leadership_meetings.why_matters: Each click represents potential commission revenue
for_leadership_meetings.action: Show which tools are most popular for vendor negotiations

for_leadership_meetings.what_to_say: Week-over-week growth across all metrics. Shows if we're trending up or down.
for_leadership_meetings.concerning_if: Conversions declining while traffic increases (conversion rate problem)
for_leadership_meetings.action: Identify which metric is lagging and focus improvement efforts

for_leadership_meetings.what_to_say: LinkedIn/Google/Direct traffic brings X conversions. Shows marketing ROI.
for_leadership_meetings.action: Increase spend on high-converting channels, cut underperformers

weekly: Weekly Growth - All Metrics (are we growing?)
Top 5 Tools by Try Free clicks (monetization focus)
monthly: Guided Ranking Completion Rate (UX quality check)
Manual vs Guided Preference (feature usage patterns)

recommended_posthog_alerts.why: Catch sudden drops in lead generation immediately

recommended_posthog_alerts.condition: Overall Conversion Rate < 5% for 2 consecutive days

recommended_posthog_alerts.why: Users finding questions too difficult or not valuable

immediate: âœ… Verify all insights are displaying data correctly

âœ… Set up alerts for critical metrics
this_week: Review specialized dashboards (Tool Performance, Attribution, etc.)
Establish baseline metrics for your targets
Document current conversion rate for future comparison
ongoing: Check Executive Metrics dashboard weekly in team meetings
Use Traffic Source Performance to guide marketing decisions
Use Top Tools data for vendor partnership prioritization
Monitor trends to catch issues early

integration_with_supabase_analytics.dual_tracking_benefit: PostHog for dashboards, Supabase for deep user-level data
supabase_best_for: Tool action context (match scores, position data)
integration_with_supabase_analytics.both_systems_working_together: PostHog shows the 'what' (metrics, trends), Supabase shows the 'why' (detailed context)
